articles.description: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said it had administered 4,563,260 first doses of COVID-19 vaccines in the country as of Monday morning and distributed 15,418,500 doses.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
(Reuters) - The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said it had administered 4,563,260 first doses of COVID-19 vaccines in the country as of Monday morning and distribut… [+980 chars]

articles.author: Emilee Speck
articles.title: Here’s how to register for the COVID-19 vaccine in Florida - WKMG News 6 & ClickOrlando
articles.description: In the final days of 2020, people in Florida 65 and older began receiving their first shots of the coronavirus vaccine but where and when those doses will become available will vary from county to county.
